title: Can you list all BTS albums in order? - Quora

response.answer_text: Korean Albums: Debut album: 2COOL4SKOOL 1st Mini Album: O!RUL8,2? 2nd Mini Album: SKOOL LUV AFFAIR 1st Full Album: Dark & Wild 3rd Mini Album: 화양연화 ( The Most Beautiful Moment In Life ) Pt.1 4th Mini Album: 화앙연화 ( The Most Beautiful Moment In Life ) Pt.2 1st Compilation Album: 화앙연화 ( The Most Beautiful Moment In Life ) Young Forever 2nd Full Album: WINGS 1st Repackage: YNWA 5th Mini Album: Love Yourself: Her 3rd Full album: Love Yourself: Tear 3rd Repackage/ Compilation Album: Love Yourself: Answer. 6th Mini Album: Map Of The Soul: Persona 4th Full Album: Map Of The Soul: 7 Japanese Albums/Releases: Debut Single Album: No More Dream 2nd Single Album: Boy in Luv 3rd Single Album: Danger 1st Full Album: Wake Up Debut Anniversary Single: For You 5th Single Album: I Need U 6th Single Album: Run 2nd Full Album: YOUTH 7th Single Album: 血，汗， 涙 （Blood, Sweat & Tears) 8th Single Album: MIC DROP/ DNA/ CRYSTAL SNOW 3rd Full Album: Face Yourself 9th Single Album: FAKE LOVE/ AIRPLANE PT.2 10th Single Album: Lights/ Boy With Luv 4th Full Album: Map of The Soul: 7 ~The Journey~ [updated as at 16/09/2020 1430 SGT] note: updated version has BTS japan releases & albums!! feel free to ask about the albums if you have any questions!

2 cool 4 Skool O!RUL8,2? Skool luv Affair Dark & Wild Wake up (Japanese) The most beautiful moment in life pt 1 (Hyyh) The most beautiful moment in life pt 2 The most beautiful moment in life: Young Forever (Repackage) Youth (Japanese) WINGS WINGS: You Never Walk Alone (Repackage) Love Yourself: Her Face Yourself (Japanese) Love Yourself: Tear Love Yourself: Answer (Repackage) +The japanese new singles aka Fake Love and Airplane part 2. +Festa 2018 Songs aka Ddaeng, Spring Day Rocking vibe remix and Jin’s cover Autumn Outside the Post Office +Waste it On Me by Steve Aoki feat. BTS (RM and JK + Jimin) Solo Mixtapes: RM - RapMonster (aka RM) AgustD- AgustD Hope World- Jhope Mono. - RM +If you add every Festa songs too +Cover Single Come back Home +Lotte Duty Free song (You’re so Beautiful) +Mic Drop feat desiinger and Steve Aoki +And ofcourse the pre-debut songs. That’s everything BTS released.

I know that they debuted with 2 Cool 4 Skool. Next we have O!RUL8,2? (super underrated album by the way). Then it was Dark and Wild. Can’t forget about Skool Luv Affair (“Boy in Luv”). They also released their first ever Japanese album, Wake Up.  After that should be the start of the HYYH era: The Most Beautiful Moment in Life Parts 1 and 2. Then we have the compilation album of The Most Beautiful Moment in Life: Young Forever. They also released their second Japanese album, Youth.  Next we have the start of a new era: Wings. And with Wings, came “Spring Day” and all the good stuff which is all compiled in You Never Walk Alone. Dun dun dun, that’s the end of another era.  Now we have Love Yourself: Her which was later accompanied with its Japanese counterpart Face Yourself which brought us beautiful melodies like “Don’t Leave Me” and “Let Go.” The Love Yourself series doesn’t end there, however. We have record breaking Love Yourself: Tear and it wouldn’t be a proper ending to a BTS era without a compilation album—Love Yourself: Answer.  Keep smiling!

HI there! This is the list of all the album names and release dates from BTS. Hope that this is helpful for you! 💜2 Cool 4 Skool (June 12th 2013)💜O!RUL8,2? (September 11th 2013)💜Skool Luv Affair (February 12, 2014)💜Skool Luv Affair:Special Edition (May 13, 2014)💜No More Dream (Japanese album) (June 4, 2014)💜BOY IN LUV (Japanese album) (July 16, 2014)💜Dark & Wild (August 19, 2014) 💜Danger (Japanese album) (November 19, 2014)💜Wake Up (Japanese album) (December 24, 2014)💜The Most Beautiful Moment In Life Pt.1 (April 29, 2015)💜FOR YOU (Japanese album) (June 17, 2015)💜The Most Beautiful Moment In Life Pt.2 (November 30, 2015)💜I NEED U (Japanese album) (December 8, 2015)💜RUN (Japanese album) (March 15, 2016)💜The Most Beautiful Moment In Life: Young Forever (May 2, 2016)💜Youth (Japanese album) (September 7, 2016)💜WINGS (October 10, 2016)💜You Never Walk Alone (February 13, 2017)💜Blood Sweat & Tears (Japanese Album) (May 10, 2017)💜Love Yourself: Her (September 18, 2017)💜MIC DROP / DNA / CRYSTAL SNOW (Japanese album) (December 6, 2017)💜Face Yourself (Japanese album) (April 4, 2018)💜Love Yourself: Tear (May 18, 2018)💜Love Yourself: Answer (August 24, 2018)💜FAKE LOVE/Airplane Pt.2 (Japanese Album) (November 7, 2018)💜Map of the Soul: Persona (April 12, 2019)💜BTS World Original Soundtrack (June 28, 2019)💜Lights/Boy With Luv (Japanese album) (July 3, 2019)💜Map of the Soul: 7 (February 21, 2020)💜Map of the Soul 7: The Journey (Japanese album) (July 14, 2020)💜“Dynamite” Single (August 21st, 2020)

Sure- 2 COOL 4 SKOOL - 2013 (their debut)O!RUL8,2? - 2013Skool Luv Affair - 2014Dark and Wild - 2014 (probably my favorite era)Wake Up - 2014The Most Beautiful Moment In Life, Pt. 1 - 2015The Most Beautiful Moment In Life, Pt. 2 - 2015The Most Beautiful Moment In Life: Young Forever - 2016Youth - 2016Wings - 2016Love Yourself: Her - 2017Face Yourslef - 2018 (when I became an A.R.M.Y)Love Yourself: Answer - 2018I believe I got all of them, but don’t quote me on it. I don’t have a favorite album because they are all amazing on their own. I’m looking foreword to any new music they are going to make. I hope this helped. Ava~

BTS Latest: Currently, BTS has released 4 studio albums, including 2 Korean studio albums i.e Dark & Wild which were released in 2014 and another one is "Wings" which was released in 2016 and there were 2 Japanese studio albums i.e "Wake Up" which was released in 2014 and another one was "Youth" which was released in 2016. All albums in order of release: 2 COOL 4 SKOOL in 2013. 2 cool for skoolO!Rul8,2Skool luv AffairDark & WildHYYH Pt.1HYYH Pt.2HYYH: Young ForeverWings/ You never walk aloneLove Yourself HerLove Yourself TearWhen the BTS - Bangtan Boys tour were announced, Tickets were sold in minutes, people were looking for the tickets eagerly, here is the source from where you can get the BTS concert tickets at reasonable rates, Check the collection of tickets and make a choice!!! Good luck..!
